Job ID: 002933

Description:
Position Summary:The Data Analyst will be responsible for assessing, support and managing business systems in the Adolescence Division. This role acts as a technology liaison to management teams to analyze business requirements as well as design, develop, and implement solutions related to business processes, reports and data integrity.

Responsibilities:
  • Meet the needs of Adolescence Division by project planning, analysis, design, implementation, testing, integration and maintenance of Salesforce Platform
  • Manage and prioritize ongoing support requests and administrative needs of end users
  • Perform development, testing, implementation of Visualforce Pages/APEX and utilize third party installed packages to customize interface
  • Create and manage (test, deploy) Salesforce custom objects, fields, formulas, validation rules, custom workflow, approval processes and other enhancements
  • Maintain data integrity through periodic data uploads, updates and archiving using Dataloader
  • Provide comprehensive training and documentation to new users to ensure Salesforce capabilities are used accurately and consistently
  • Create and schedule reports and dashboards for analyzing key data points
  • Troubleshoot helpdesk issues and provide technical support when needed
Qualifications:
  • High School Diploma/GED required
  • 2 years of data analytics and/or relevant experience
  • Salesforce Knowledge Preferred:
    •
  • Experience configuring various Salesforce modules
  • Understanding of Visualforce Pages/APEX and its capabilities
Competencies Required:
  • Problem Solving
  • Object Oriented Analysis
  • End-user Support

Requirements:

  • Full Time
